title: BackToCali
author: BackToCali
content: As in the title, anyone has an idea what is profitable today to CPU mining etc?I have an aws code of $100k I am looking for an good idea to monetize it. I am looking for something unique

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: I think you might of missed the boat. ETH mining ends in about 2 hours.No idea if you are allowed to use any of the AWS code or credits for mining. But I am assuming the most profitable would of been renting some GPUs and mining ETH with it. However ETH mining is finally coming to an end in about 2 hours. With CPU the most profitable is Monero.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: BackToCali on September 15, 2022, 03:19:49 AMAs in the title, anyone has an idea what is profitable today to CPU mining etc?I have an aws code of $100k I am looking for an good idea to monetize it. I am looking for something unique  Are you sure you can use your aws code of $100k for mining? These codes are given for other tasks such as supporting startups and others. As soon as you start mining on a cloud server, you will be blocked because Amazon does not allow you to use their equipment for mining.

comments.author: BackToCali
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on September 15, 2022, 10:19:37 AMQuote from: BackToCali on September 15, 2022, 03:19:49 AMAs in the title, anyone has an idea what is profitable today to CPU mining etc?I have an aws code of $100k I am looking for an good idea to monetize it. I am looking for something unique  Are you sure you can use your aws code of $100k for mining? These codes are given for other tasks such as supporting startups and others. As soon as you start mining on a cloud server, you will be blocked because Amazon does not allow you to use their equipment for mining.I also thought about rendering and video encoding. I just need to establish a good cooperation.
